Dialogs.Text: Thomas B: They thought they were the first ones to discover this server...
Thomas B: But there is evidence in the chat that there was somebody else here before them.
Thomas B: Probably the person who either truly discovered this server first or the one who opened it.
Thomas B: And there is also the issue of them trying to keep track which group of them entered first in a room.
Thomas B: Evidence suggests that there is at least one member that enter a room first, but didn't inform the rest...
Thomas B: Meaning, there is people among them that are not as strict or organized.
Thomas B: And also, there is the possibility that they are not keeping track of what the other group is doing or...
Thomas B: That they could be people that are not part of either group.
